name: SJ-19 Learns To Love!
description:
SJ-19 Learns to Love is a short boss focused metroidvania about a KILLER ROBOT who learns to love. Fight and explore a mysterious planet while gaining ~EMOTIONAL MATURITY~

  • 100+ rooms to EXTERMINATE. Including areas like BONE CITY and THE LAB. 🌎
  • 8 bosses to battle, including BIG FROG and Steve the Milkman! 💀
  • Chat about ANIME with Tokotsu-kun 📺
  • Items to gain abilities and power, like MILK for some strong robot bones. 🥛
  • Frogs! Lots of them. 🐸
  • Collect SP to upgrade your gun, missiles, and others! 🔫
  • Learn to love! 💕



Will SJ-19 fulfill their destiny as a KILLER ROBOT or learn to love and save everyone?!


🥛💀 Are you BAD enough to defeat STEVE the milkman?! 💀🥛
